I have some extra room on several of my dedicated servers and I was looking to help out some other gaming communities. In turn all I ask is that it will be a source game that has a motd in it. There will also be an available FTP and control panel. We can also supply a fast download, if needed. I hope that this is allowed to be posted here. I apologize, if it is not. 

Thanks!
